abstract: last day to load up on liquor before christmas is saturday .
article: holidays can be stressful . with the presents and wrapping and caroling and eating and housing family , christmas can be a lot to take on . those looking to take the holiday edge off with a cocktail need to make sure they have their supplies by saturday . liquor stores are never open on sundays in texas and will be closed monday due to christmas . related : top alcohol sellers in bexar county in october 2017looking ahead to new year 's day , san antonians will also have to some pre-planning . december 31 falls on a sunday when liquor stores are closed and they are also closed on january 1 .

the texas alcoholic beverage commission 's website lists hours for all liquor stores in the state being 10 a. m. to 9 p. m.but , those too busy getting ready for company or wrapping last-minute gifts who forget to make a liquor store run can settle for beer . beer is sold at grocery and convenience stores on sundays between noon and midnight , according to the tabc . beer is also available for purchase on christmas at any grocery or convenience store that 's open . kelsey bradshaw is a digital reporter for mysa . com . read more of her stories here .
